subject: Science
title: Giant Squid: Monster of the Deep
description: Learn Giant Squid: Monster of the Deep in one minute.

hook.text: For centuries, the giant squid was a myth. Sailors called it the Kraken.

buildup.text: Giant squid live at depths of 300â€“1,000 m and grow up to 13 meters long.

discovery.text: Their eyes are the size of dinner plates â€” the largest in the animal kingdom.

twist.text: The first photo of a living giant squid was taken in 2004. The first video, in 2012.

climax.text: Sperm whales dive deep to hunt them. Scars on whales prove epic battles occur.

punchline.text: We filmed a living giant squid only 12 years ago. The ocean hides its secrets well.

quiz.question: When was a living giant squid first photographed?
